name: Hotel Autantic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Hotel is a hidden gem offering wonderful rooms,in a delightfully quiet location and a simple yet quality breakfast.
reviews.title: Wonderful hidden gem

description: At the entrance to the Haute-Tarentaise, at the foot of the biggest summer and winter ski resorts of Savoie, a charming hotel offers you the comfort and tranquility.You will be welcomed any day of the year, in a green and relaxing environment where the nobility of the stone, the warmth of the wood, the originality of the antique and period furnishings all contribute to the creation of a savoyard ambience.You will find all the mountain sports within close proximity: skiing, snow shoeing, rafting, canoeing, mountain biking, hiking, paragliding, …Guests to the hotel Autantic will be welcomed personaly in the most simple and friendly manner. Within this peaceful environment we have been able to marry the authentic and the modern in order for you to feel at home.The reception at the hotel Autantic is open from 7.30am to 12.00pm and from 1.30pm to 8.00pm.You will appreciate the peaceful environnement of the hotel Autantic in Bourg Saint Maurice.
